question: What is the theme of the the 25th National Children Science Congress (NCSC-2017)?
option4: Science and Innovation for Sustainable Development
answer: Science and Innovation for Sustainable Development
explanation: The 25th edition of National Children Science Congress (NCSC-2017) has inaugurated by Gujarat Chief Minister Vijay Rupani in Ahmedabad on December 27. The theme of the five-day Congress is \'Science and Innovation for Sustainable Development\' with the special focus on persons with disabilities. 50 children and teachers from Asian nations will participate in the event this year. Apart from science exhibition, the event will witness various activities such as hands-on demonstrations, presentations by child scientists, poster session and cultural programmes. The NCSC is an ideal and innovative programme for children to inspire, empower and expand their minds to world. It is a flagship programme of department of Science & Technology, Ministry of Science and Technology.
